pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: The video features a serene indoor pool area with tiled walls and soft natural light streaming through a window. The water is calm, and there is a dark arched passageway partially submerged at the far end of the room. The camera slowly moves closer to the passageway, enhancing the tranquil and mysterious atmosphere.
